nodes.text: Keredians were a species of humanoids that had little information about them including their homeworld. Initially some of the Keredian race joined the Partisans but after the Death Star destroyed Jedha City, they joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic to continue their fight against the tyranny of the Empire. One such member of this race was Cycyed Ock, who used a vibrorang as his weapon. Ruk was also a Keredian who was a member of the Tech Masters.
Keredian species were first introduced in the mobile game Star Wars: Force Arena, after its 1.5 update on April 5, 2017.
